translations: v.猛增；冲天而起（zoom 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Zooming in further would reveal even more jaggedness.
sentences.translation: 进一步放大将揭示更多的锯齿状。

sentences.sentence: Zooming also works well in this release.
sentences.translation: 此版本的缩放表现的也不错。

sentences.sentence: Nick went zooming past in his new car.
sentences.translation: 尼克开着新车轰地一声飞驰而过。
